sectionText: Electroacoustic Music Collaboration: This course targets performers and composers interested in developing greater fluency with electroacoustic art music. Students form composer-performer duos and spend the semester engaged in a collaborative composition project for their particular instrument(s). Teams meet on a weekly or bi-weekly basis to discuss, share, and critique progress. Pieces are presented in concert at the end of the semester. Collaborative groupings may flex depending on enrollment. Composer prerequisite: Senior or graduate standing in music and completion of MUS 409 or equivalent. Performer prerequisite: Senior or graduate standing in music or permission of the instructor.
